name: Snail of Honor
description: Snail of Honor is about a snail(Named Greg) who lived a peaceful life until the apocalypse came home from work and started apocalypseing. His only tool is a M134-A2 HPA Vulcan Minigun,(controlled only with the mouse) his only friend death itself. His goal: Kill the Arch-Salt lord in these fast paced randomly generated levels while rocking out to award-winning music by...(DanWALL).
